data.author: contradict
data.message:
[rqt_image_view] Add a scroll area

When selecting a 1-to-1 pixel view, the previous implementation resized the
window to the full image size. This is inconvenient for images much larger than
the screen resolution. This patch places the RatioLayoutedFrame in a ScrollArea
so the window still fits on the screen and the user can pan on the full image.

data.author: Robert Haschke
data.message:
fixed message_tree_model to list individual elements of simple-type array elements

Traversing the message model stopped when subelements didn't had
__slots__ anymore. However, this excluded native-type arrays for
completion.

data.author: Robert Haschke
data.message:
fixed topic_completer to handle array subscriptions

Given a topic reference for a message like /topic/field[1]/subfield[2],
the message_tree_model splits it into /topic/field/[*]/subfield/[*],
i.e. inserting an additional level for the array itself, before listing
the individual elements.
However, the TreeModelCompleter only splits along / and thus stops
working at array subscripts [*].
Overwriting the splitPath() method (inserting a / before array
subscripts) fixes this issue.

Merge pull request #263 from stonier/patch-2

White background to contrast with black pens

data.author: Daniel Stonier
data.message:
White background to contrast with black pens

In a dark qt theme, the default background for the graphics scene will be black. Since the frame renderer uses black pens, this leaves it unreadable. So fix the background brush to white here.

See also https://github.com/ros-visualization/rqt/pull/40/files

data.author: trainman419
data.message:
Fix closing and reopning rqt_bag topic views

This addresses several bugs:
 * It wasn't possible to close topic views when running standalone
 * If topic views were closed (non-standalone), it wasn't possible to
   open them again

This also moves the logic for handling open/close interactions out of
the TopicMessageView class, where they might not always be called, and
into the owning class instead

data.message:
add displaying of topic/connection statistics along edges

if topic statistics are available (/statistics) then print
them along the edges (if in NODE_NODE mode).

Displayed are

* frequency, delay (based on the header.stamp) and traffic (in kb/s)
  as text
* delay again using the color of the edge is an indicator (green to red)
* traffic using the penwidth of the edge

rqt_plot: decreased required minimum padding to 0

data.author: Forrest Voight
data.message:
rqt_plot: don't have required minimum padding

With a fixed absolute minimum padding, rqt_plot is useless for plotting
arbitrarily small values. (For example, trying to plot a magnetic field
measured in teslas, usually having a magnitude of about 1e-4.)

data.author: Scott K Logan
data.message:
rqt_reconfigure: Add ability to open clients from command line

This allows a user to list the names of dynamic reconfigure servers they wish
to connect to on startup. Unlike the original implementation in
reconfigure_gui, this makes rqt_reconfigure accept any number of clients, not
just one.

The servers can also be referenced using relative paths from the namespace
where rqt_reconfigure is started.

rqt_graph: changed the method of zooming

data.author: William Woodall
data.message:
rqt_graph: changed the method of zooming

This new method handles smaller step sizes. The
trackpad on Macbook Pros have a step size which
ranges from +/-2 up to +/-1200, but with a normal
mouse, in OS X or Linux, the step size is always
+/-120 or +/-240. This new method scales better
with smaller step sizes, making scrolling
smoother when using a track pad, which was pretty
much useless before.

Background colour for the scene

data.author: Daniel Stonier
data.message:
Background colour for the scene

The ros graph plugin shows up badly in dark coloured qt themes (black ellipses on a dark background).

I usually don't like forcing colours in an themed application, but in a rendered scene, your theme doesn't have a choice over the colours of the components (black ellipses for the nodes, etc), so it's choice of matching background is often wrong. This helps with that.

 - Scroll bar's position gets reset per second.
